summary: Iteration 7 testing for La Pulpería app - All requested features verified: 1) Logo has triangular red roof with wavy awning (toldo ondulado), 2) Landing page is responsive for mobile (375px) and PC (1920px), 3) 'Cerrar Tienda' option exists in Profile page for pulperia users, 4) Featured ads system endpoints working correctly
critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Logo (LandingPage.js lines 127-137): Has triangular roof using polygon element (points='50,8 15,38 85,38') and wavy awning using path with quadratic curves (Q28 38 38 45 Q48 52 58 45...)
✅ Responsive Design: Landing page tested on desktop (1920px) and mobile (375px) - all elements properly sized and visible
✅ Close Store in Profile (UserProfile.js lines 235-260): 'Cerrar Tienda' section only shows for user_type='pulperia' with at least one pulpería
✅ Close Store Dialog (UserProfile.js lines 323-394): Confirmation dialog with input for pulperia name, proper validation, data-testid attributes
✅ Featured Ads Endpoints: GET /api/featured-ads works without auth, GET /api/featured-ads/my-slot requires auth, POST /api/featured-ads/upload requires auth
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 requested features verified: 1) Logo has triangular red roof (polygon points='50,8 15,38 85,38') with wavy awning (path with Q curves for ondulated effect), 2) Landing page responsive - tested on 1920px desktop and 375px mobile, 3) 'Cerrar Tienda' option in Profile page (UserProfile.js) only shows for pulperia users with pulperías, includes confirmation dialog requiring exact name match, 4) Featured ads system: GET /api/featured-ads public, GET /api/featured-ads/my-slot and POST /api/featured-ads/upload require authentication. Backend uses ADMIN_EMAIL='onol4sco05@gmail.com' for admin access.
